name: World Cup Finals Tournaments Multiple Choice Quiz | FIFA World Cup | 10 Questions

questions.text: What was introduced for the first time in the World Cup in Mexico in 1970?
questions.correct: Substitutes plus Red and Yellow Cards
options: Yellow Cards, Injury Time and 32 Countries Competing
questions.explanation: Substitutes plus Red and Yellow Cards.

questions.text: Ferenc Puskas was the last player to play for two different countries in the World Cup Finals, Hungary in 1954 and Spain in 1962. True or False?
questions.explanation:
False & F.

	Robert Prosinecki played for Yugoslavia in 1990 and Croatia in 1998.

questions.text: How long did it take for Jose Batista to get sent off for Uruguay against Scotland in the 1986 World Cup Finals?
questions.explanation:
56 seconds.

	He holds the dubious record of the fastest sending off in the Finals.

questions.text: What is unusual about the feat achieved by the Hungarian player, Laszlo Kiss, which has only happened once in the World Cup Finals?
questions.correct: He is the only substitute to score a hat-trick
options: He is the only player to appear who used to be a woman
He missed two penalties and scored an own goal in one game
He is the only person to play and referee in the history of the finals
questions.explanation:
He is the only substitute to score a hat-trick.

	When Hungary beat El Salvaldor 10-1 in 1982.

questions.text: How old was the Cameroon player, Roger Milla, when he scored a goal against Russia in 1994?
When Daniel Passarella was coach of Argentina, what kind of players would he not select for the team?
questions.correct: Players with long hair or earrings
options: Players with long hair and unshaven faces
questions.explanation:
Players with long hair or earrings.

	As long as a player performs - who cares what they are or what they look like.

questions.text: Every letter in the alphabet has been used for players surnames who have competed in the Finals. True or False?
Which player returned to playing football just weeks before the 1982 World Cup Finals, due to him being suspended for two years for a bribery scandal?
questions.explanation:
Paolo Rossi.

	Paolo Rossi ended up being the top scorer of the Finals and a World Cup Winner. (Italy 3 West Germany 1).

questions.text: Erik Nilsson of Sweden and Alfred Bickel of Switzerland are known in the history of the Finals for what?
questions.correct: The only players to play before and after World War II
options: They were involved in the first double sending off
They were the first brother-in-laws to play
The only two players to play over 50 years of age
questions.explanation: The only players to play before and after World War II.

questions.text: In the World Cup Finals in 1978, Ramon Quiroga, a goalkeeper playing in a game for Peru was booked for what?
questions.correct: For a foul in the opponent's half of the field
options: Balancing on the crossbar of the goal during a celebration
questions.explanation: For a foul in the opponent's half of the field.
